TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit BIND_OPTS extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Stores the parameters that are used during a moniker binding operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `BIND_OPTS` in the MSDN library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](../Topic/How%20to:%20Map%20HRESULTs%20and%20Exceptions.md).

Docs.summary: Specifies the size, in bytes, of the structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `BIND_OPTS` in the MSDN library.

Docs.summary: Indicates the amount of time (clock time in milliseconds, as returned by the function) that the caller specified to complete the binding operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This member lets the caller limit the execution time of an operation when speed is of primary importance.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `BIND_OPTS` in the MSDN library.

Docs.summary: Controls aspects of moniker binding operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `BIND_OPTS` in the MSDN library.

Docs.summary: Represents flags that should be used when opening the file that contains the object identified by the moniker.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `BIND_OPTS` in the MSDN library.
